atoms
Class Atom

java.lang.Object
  atoms.Atom
Direct Known Subclasses:
Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Sulfer
public abstract class Atom
extends java.lang.Object

Atom Class. Describes the structure for a general atom. All units in Angstroms (10^-10 meters).

Author:
Giallanza, Johnson, Swartz

isBondedTo

public boolean isBondedTo(Atom other)
Checks if the current atom is bonded to the input atom. Note: the input atom should be distinct from the target atom.

Parameters:
other - -The input atom
Returns:
-Returns true if said bond exists
